adrFormatAddress: 9 Barry Rd, Brooklyn, NY 11231, USA

originalText.text: The IPA is a group of thoughtful people gathering resources, people, and ideas to make a difference in the future of our city.  We are so happy to have teamed up with these great folks to put on events at their Governors Island HQ!

text.text: The IPA is a group of thoughtful people gathering resources, people, and ideas to make a difference in the future of our city.  We are so happy to have teamed up with these great folks to put on events at their Governors Island HQ!

originalText.text: I had a great time visiting the Institute for Public Architecture over the weekend. I really appreciated the warm welcome when I entered the space and enjoyed learning about the research the fellows were conducting. The library has an inspiring collection of architecture/art literature and seems like a great work space. I would highly recommend visiting the space and learning more about the work done at the IPA.

text.text: I had a great time visiting the Institute for Public Architecture over the weekend. originalText.text: I joined the IPA for a home-cooked/grilled meal and conversation with urbanists from across the city at their summer residency at the Block House. Spending time at the Block House and the IPA's summer fellows was a lovely way to experience and learn about Governors Island.

text.text: I joined the IPA for a home-cooked/grilled meal and conversation with urbanists from across the city at their summer residency at the Block House. Spending time at the Block House and the IPA's summer fellows was a lovely way to experience and learn about Governors Island.

originalText.text: Beautiful house in a very nice green part of Governors Island. The house is ideal for art, architecture and writing residencies. Open library every weekend, with a nice starting collection of architecture books.

text.text: Beautiful house in a very nice green part of Governors Island. The house is ideal for art, architecture and writing residencies. Open library every weekend, with a nice starting collection of architecture books.

originalText.text: I loved my tour of the Block House and had a great time talking to the current cast of residents. It was inspiring and everyone was welcoming. Lots to discover!

text.text: I loved my tour of the Block House and had a great time talking to the current cast of residents. It was inspiring and everyone was welcoming. Lots to discover!
